info.title: Reservation Document
info.description: For example, user might create a reservation for a material with some quantity and assign that reserved material to a cost center, a sales order or an asset. A reservation can also be created for a transfer posting from one plant to another. For an existing reservation, you can change the updatable fields of the items. The service also allows to delete existing reservation documents. It can be consumed by external systems and user interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve, create, update and delete reservation documents using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads information on reservation document header level
get.description: Reads reservation document header information to get an overview of the reservation document postings.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description: Creates a reservation document compost by header and items for a specific business process.

get.summary: Reads information for a specific reservation document header
get.description: Reads reservation document header information for a specific reservation document to get an overview of the reservation document posting.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

delete.description: Deletes a reservation document that you specify by the reservation document number.

get.description: Reads reservation document header and reservation documents items information for a specific reservation document to get an overview of the reservation document posting.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_ReservationDocumentHeader HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
